\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Make \w search|strong="H1245"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* make \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w search|strong="H1245"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* covered \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*; \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* put \w away|strong="H5186"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*; \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w help|strong="H5833"\w*: \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w or|strong="H0408"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* \w support|strong="H5833"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H5203"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*.

\w Do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* hands, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w come|strong="H6965"\w* \w out|strong="H6965"\w* against \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* men breathing destruction.
